item.description:
Happy Spring from the Brettl-Hupfers Ski and Sports Club

Come join the Brettl-Hupfers Ski and Sports club for a social and some pool at Flat Top Johnnies in Kendall Square on Thursday, May 7th at 730 PM.

Just because the skiing and riding is over, doesn’t mean we stop having good times. Bring yourself and friends. We’ll be getting 3 or 4 pool tables. Come meet our members, hear what the club is all about and see what the club STILL has to offer.

We are an all year round ski and sports club with male and female members of all ages. We offer fun social activities all year round, ranging from hiking, canoeing, tubing, to skiing, snow shoeing and social gatherings.

Be sure to ask us about our Summer volleyball league for beginners and intermediates as well as our 21st annual Tubing and BBQ event third weekend in July.

If you have any questions, call Paul at 617 699 4433.

Flat Top Johnnies
1 Kendall Sq
Cambridge, MA 02139
(617) 494-9565

Redline Kendal Square and on street / garage parking is available nearby

Thanks,
Paul

Hope to see you there.
item.name: Pool night at Flat Top Johnny's
